email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have a prompt vessel available for your wheat shipment from Brisbane to Shanghai. The vessel MV GOLDEN HARVEST is workable, with a DWT of 75000 and LOA of 225m. Our initial freight quote is $55 per metric ton under CIF terms.

Laycan is 2023-10-05 to 2023-10-10. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. We are seeing rates closer to $50 per metric ton. Could you review and adjust the rate?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market conditions, we can adjust the rate to $52 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, and the laytime is 4 days.

Please confirm if this revised rate and terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The revised rate of $52 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we would like to request a laytime extension to 5 days. Could you accommodate this request?

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We can extend the laytime to 5 days as requested. Please confirm if we can proceed with the shipment under these terms.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We confirm the terms and are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please send the contract for review.

Best regards,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Brisbane to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will prepare the contract and send it to you shortly.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
